mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gimage(gimageid,origin_image_name, new_image_name, image_path,gno) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(gimageid), 0) + 1 FROM gimage), #{imageVo.originImageName}, #{imageVo.newImageName}, #{imageVo.imagePath},#{gno})
mapper.select: SELECT gimageid, origin_image_name AS originImageName, new_image_name AS newImageName, image_path AS imagePath,gno FROM gimage WHERE gno = #{gno}
